alacritty.warning: Alacritty can only load one configuration file. Multiple configs will overwrite each other.
alacritty.suggestion: Consider using different config names or environment-specific subdirectories.

kitty.warning: Kitty can only load one configuration file. Multiple configs will overwrite each other.
kitty.suggestion: Consider using different config names or environment-specific subdirectories.

st.suggestion: Consider using different config names or environment-specific subdirectories.

urxvt.suggestion: Consider using different config names or environment-specific subdirectories.

eww.info: EWW supports multiple configuration files and can load them via command line arguments.
eww.suggestion: Use --config flag to specify different config files.

fabric.info: Fabric supports multiple configuration files and can load them via command line arguments.
fabric.suggestion: Use --config flag to specify different config files.

weld.info: Weld supports multiple configuration files and can load them via command line arguments.
weld.suggestion: use 'weldctl enable <widget-name>' to enable a widget.

waybar.info: Waybar supports multiple configuration files via --config flag.
waybar.suggestion: Use --config flag to specify different config files or use subdirectory structure.

hyprland.info: Hyprland supports multiple configuration files and can load them via command line arguments.
hyprland.suggestion: Use --config flag to specify different config files.

labwc.suggestion: Use --config flag to specify different config files.

openbox.suggestion: Use --config flag to specify different config files.
